mapper.select: select printerID,deliverPointID,deliverTime,deliverWay,deliverNum from printDeliver natural join printer where stationID = #{stationID} limit #{begin},15
mapper.delete: delete from printDeliver where printerID = #{printerID} and deliverPointID = #{deliverPointID}
mapper.insert:
insert into printDeliver
printerID,
deliverPointID,
deliverTime,
deliverWay,
deliverNum,
#{printerID},
#{deliverPointID},
#{deliverTime},
#{deliverWay},
#{deliverNum},
mapper.update:
update printDeliver
printerID = #{printerID},
deliverPointID = #{deliverPointID},
deliverTime = #{deliverTime},
deliverWay = #{deliverWay},
deliverNum = #{deliverNum},
where printerID = #{printerID} and deliverPointID = #{deliverPointID}
